test whether volatile fields for jna Structure are initialized:
* for java allocated instances: yes, whole allocation is zeroed
* for c allocated instances: no

$ make test
LD_PRELOAD=/d/jnaStructVolatileSemantics/dbgmalloc.so java -jar target/jnaStructVolatileSemantics-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar
dumping 0x7fb40c345f50
0 0 0 0
